parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the additional integer value in the item with the given index of the listbox or combobox with id idc of the topmost user [[dialog]] to the given value.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lbSetValue''' [idc, index, value]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, index, value]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> value: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''lbSetValue''' [index, value]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [index, value]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] of control

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> value: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lbSetValue]] [101, 0, 1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[lbSetValue]] [0, 1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetCurSel]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetPicture]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lbSize]], [[lbSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted: Sep 10 2014</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]</dt>
<dd class="note">More information on the [[CT_LISTBOX]] command family can be found [[CT_LISTBOX#Scripting_Example|here]].
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.96|LBSETVALUE]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 21, 2014 - 02:19 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Fett Li|Fett Li]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
lbSetValue only accepts integer, no decimal number.<br>
Example:<br>
CONTROL lbSetValue [index,10]; // value will be 10<br>
CONTROL lbSetValue [index,3.1]; // value will be 3<br>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
